item.description:
Join others from Boston Small Business Success Network at the Jumpstart Your Small Business Marketing workshop on Friday, Feb. 22 from 8:30am to 11:00am sponsored by Thrive Hive.

Space is limited and this workshop is promoted elsewhere, so don't delay.  Attendance is free, but pre-registration is required. See below for details

About This Event

In an era where consumers go online to search for services, marketing your business online has never been more complicated. During this session we will review the elements of a good digital marketing strategy and then provide an action plan of quick things you can do to build your digital foundation and improve your online marketing immediately.

We will also review actual cases and provide a real-life case study on how they could improve their online marketing.

About the Event Sponsor

ThriveHive gives local businesses a plan to market their business and an easy-to-use platform to build and measure it all.

Cost and How to Register

The workshop is free.   Capacity is limited and the event is promoted elsewhere, so you need get a free ticket in advance.

Register here or click the yellow Register Now button to reserve your spot.

Make sure to mark your calendar now so you don't forget.

Got Questions?

You can post your questions below.
item.name: Jumpstart Your Small Business Marketing
